Text:
I live in a country with slow internet, can anyone tell me if it's faster to use the big d/l or the smaller ones?
thanks again

Do not lie to this man.  lol.  It would be faster for him and his friends to reenact the game.  Boo you slow internet!  Though, In all seriousness, the 720p file may be faster if it is seeding better.
Yes, indeed, but on the same conditions the 540p is faster.
